abilities.name: Perfect Transformation
abilities.description: Allows the user to transform into a perfect physical copy of anyone they have touched with their right hand, including voice.
limitations: Cannot copy the person's mind or memories
Must have physically touched the person with right hand
Cannot copy wounds or battle damage on the copied person

keyMoments.title: Mr. 2 Impersonates Usopp
keyMoments.description: Mr. 2 uses his Mane Mane no Mi to transform into Usopp and approach Vivi on horseback.
keyMoments.significance: Tactical use of the Devil Fruit for infiltration and deception.

notes: The Mane Mane no Mi is particularly dangerous for infiltration and espionage, as demonstrated by Mr. 2's tactical use in this episode.
